electronics.name: Hair Trimmer
electronics.description: 20W hair trimmer for body and facial hairs. This hair trimmer contains self sharpening blades. No fear of rashes and skin cuts. 20W charger provided for charging.

electronics.name: Automatic Steamer
electronics.description: Automatic steam machine for taking steam theraphy for face. Steam enhances skin glow and reduces the dead skin, it also reduces dark eye circles.

electronics.name: 1000W Dry Iron
electronics.description: Dry iron for ironing silk, cotton, terrycot, synthetic cotton clothes. Comes with adjustable temperature range. Doesnot contain water spray.

electronics.name: PELL 256GB Laptop
electronics.description: PELL 256GB Laptop with 16GB RAM. Ideal for gaming/coding/development/editing etc. High performance intel i9 chip as well as graphic card.

electronics.name: Wireless Keyboard
electronics.description: Bluetooth wireless keyboard with bluetooth 2.0 connectivity. Suitable for all the platforms like windows, mac and linux. Upto 1 month battery life.

electronics.name: Bluetooth 5.0 Soundbar
electronics.description: Bluetooth wireless soundbar with bluetooth 2.0 connectivity. Suitable for all the platforms like windows, mac and linux. Upto 1 month battery life.

electronics.name: Poat Headphones
electronics.description: Bluetooth wireless headphones with bluetooth 2.0 connectivity. Suitable for all the platforms like windows, mac and linux. Upto 1 month battery life.

electronics.name: Washing Machine
electronics.description: Washing machine with 100 Liters capacity. Suitable for all chlothes light/heavy. Made with stainless steel and high grade plastic.

electronics.name: Fitness Watch
electronics.description: Smart fitness watch with pulse, pressure index, spO2 detection. Fitness watch with ip68 water protection. Watch has aluminium metal frames.

electronics.name: Eannon 108MP Camera
electronics.description: Eannon 108 MP Camera for professional video recording as well as production. 60W charging and suitable for indoor as well as outdoor video recording.
